summary: Iteration 44 - Tino AI Blue Theme & ElevenLabs Voice Testing. All features verified: Blue/dark theme (no pink/purple), TINO face images (male/female), ElevenLabs voice integration with 4 voices, Voice Settings panel with gender/language switching, Ask Tino button navigates to /app/tino-ai (not popup), chat messages use blue gradient.

issues: Fixed: Changed thinking state label from purple to blue gradient

critical_code_review_comments: TinoFace component correctly uses custom TINO face images from emergentagent.com
Voice Settings panel properly shows Male/Female gender buttons and Hindi/English language options
ElevenLabs voice engine is configured and displayed in Voice Settings
Ask Tino button in Layout.js correctly navigates to /app/tino-ai (not popup)
Chat messages use blue gradient (from-blue-600 to-cyan-600) instead of purple
Fixed: TinoFace thinking state label changed from purple to blue gradient
context_for_next_testing_agent: Tino AI redesign fully functional. Key features verified: 1) Blue/dark theme with slate-900/blue-900 gradient (no pink/purple), 2) Custom TINO face images from emergentagent.com (male/female), 3) ElevenLabs voice integration with 4 voices (male_hindi, female_hindi, male_english, female_english), 4) Voice Settings panel with gender/language switching, 5) Ask Tino button navigates to /app/tino-ai (unified, not popup), 6) Chat messages use blue gradient, 7) Lip-sync animation when speaking.

blue_theme.details: Dark slate/blue gradient background (from-slate-900 via-blue-900), no pink/purple colors

tino_face_images.details: Custom TINO face images from emergentagent.com - male: zun0ltqf_file_0000000025187209a5652c1654e41827.png, female: 0xijk3by_file_00000000a4b87209bd803c4c7b66fdb1.png

voice_settings_panel.details: Shows Gender (Male/Female), Language (Hindi/English), Voice Engine: ElevenLabs

gender_switching.details: Face image changes when gender is switched from Male to Female

elevenlabs_voices_api.details: /api/tino-voice/voices returns 4 voice options (male_hindi, female_hindi, male_english, female_english)

elevenlabs_status_api.details: /api/tino-voice/status confirms ElevenLabs is configured with tts_enabled=true

ask_tino_navigation.details: Ask Tino button in header navigates to /app/tino-ai (not popup)

chat_blue_gradient.details: User messages display with blue gradient (from-blue-600 to-cyan-600)

tino_ai_chat.details: Chat responds in Hindi/English with suggestions

screenshots: .screenshots/tino_ai_page.png - Tino AI page with blue theme and TINO face
.screenshots/voice_settings.png - Voice Settings panel with Male/Female/Hindi/English options
.screenshots/tino_final_test.png - Chat response with blue gradient messages
